description: Numbers whose set of base 11 digits is {1,2}.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000(* First 200 terms from Vincenzo Librandi *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..20000] | Set(IntegerToSequence(n, 11)) subset {1, 2}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 25 2012
author: _Clark Kimberling_
